Package com.camerontec.util.jmx.cascading.agent

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CascadingFailureListener
    Instances of this interface are used as listeners to be notified when the cascading fails for a particular mount point ID.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CascadingAgent
    This is a rewrite of the OpenDMK's CascadingService which addresses its scalability issues whilst preserving its behaviour.
    CascadingMBeanServerForwarder
    MBeanServerForwarder implementation that allows cascading clients to take advantage of a number of performance optimizations exposed by augmenting the management interface of the MBean server delegate: Batched retrieval of the object names and MBeanInfo of all registered MBeans.
